Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Gaigemc
Reviews.Content: I have many types of camera's and I really like this one (I've already caught two thieves with it). Depending on the area I mainly use this camera or the smoke detector camera with fish eye. Both work very well in lit area's. Good price for what you get

Reviews.Title: Solid and Great
Reviews.Author: Henry H.  Scheirer
Reviews.Content: This pinhole lens camera is built well and works great! Only took a minute to mount and plug in. Picture quality isn't perfect but it does work great. Highly recommend if your looking for an affordable camera that does a good job.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: B0d3g@
Reviews.Content: This particular item is not a smoke detector model, but rather is a motion detector look-a-like. Equally as descrete, but not as advertised. The picture does not match the product delivered.

Reviews.Title: Not a Night Vision Camera
Reviews.Author: Mike Martin
Reviews.Content: Product claimed to be a "Low Light" camera, but it will not work unless there is ample light. In a lighted area it works just fine, but turn off the switch and the screen goes black. I bought 4 of these particularly because of its claim to work in low light, so I am very disappointed with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality and camera coverage
Reviews.Author: snackdaddy
Reviews.Content: I brought this product to be used in a garage as a extra hidden security camera. The picture quality is poor at best and the camera is angled at the ceiling. Ive had 10 other cameras that Ive installed from a different company and wanted to try this brand. Im going to get this junk out and go back with the same brand that ive been using. Dont buy this junk. Spend a few more dollars and get a better brand. It even looks odd compared to the other brand.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was expecting
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: I had to return this... What is the point of having a hidden camera that looks like a smoke detector, if it has to be plugged and the cord will be seen?

Reviews.Title: What A Smoke Alarm
Reviews.Author: Monsi L'Ggrke
Reviews.Content: Guys this tool is great as long as you have a mega hard drive and cable.  I purchased all necessary components and feel that my property is protected.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy J. Gassman
Reviews.Content: Works great! I would recommend! Price is right as well! I picture is very clear. It does look like an actual smoke alarm.

Reviews.Title: Not what I thought it was
Reviews.Author: CW020695 "I would rather listen to an audio b...
Reviews.Content: I guess I should have known this camera would look cheap and that's exactly what it was.  It doesn't look like a smoke detector and is a dead give away to being a camera as a black cord comes right out of it to plug into the was outlet.  The cord is not long enough to reach very far and has to be plugged into the tv to watch what its recording.  What's the point right?!  Idk.  I will be returning it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Color CCD image sensor. Smoke detector disguised hidden camera
3.6mm lens for wide view angle. Minimum Illumination: 0.5 LUX for low-light conditions
420 horizontal lines; NTSC System. Auto-white balance control and automatic gain control
Connection Type: BNC Video & 2.1mm center positive power plug
Power requirement: DC 12V 500mA ( not included )
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Color CCD Smoke Detector Covert Hidden CCTV Security Camera Wide Angle for DVR Home Surveillance System 1AL
